alert.note: Alert for Barton (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued July 16 at 6:03PM CDT until July 16 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Tornado Warning for... South central Barton County in central Kansas... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 602 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located just northwest of Great Bend, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Barton County, including the following locations... Great Bend Airport. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
